title: Infectious Disease
author: Nancy R Gough
description: Diseases caused by viruses, bacteria, parasites, or any type of pathogen
cleaned_text: T cells are a major component of the adaptive immune system. The video shows the intracellular events that let T cells learn about and recognize virus-infected cells.
